rooms.description: Large foyer with eco-friendly natural light and Vastu compliant entrance.
Spacious living area integrating indoor-outdoor connection with large windows.
Open dining space adjacent to kitchen area, designed for joint family gatherings.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and natural ventilation.
Spacious master suite with attached bathroom, designed for privacy while following Vastu principles.
Cozy guest room suitable for joint family members or visitors.
Shared bathroom adjacent to master bedroom, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Luxury home theater integrated with high-end audio-visual equipment.
Eco-friendly swimming pool designed to blend with the farmhouse aesthetics, incorporating water recycling features.

openings.features: Energy-efficient glass windows allowing natural light.
Large sliding doors providing access to outdoor spaces.
Natural ventilation openings and exhaust systems.
